mapper.select: select duierInfo_name as duierName, duierInfo_id as duierId, (select duierClass_name from duierClass where duierClass_id = duierInfo_class_id) as duierClass, duierInfo_activity_introduction as duierIntroduction, duierInfo_activity_img as duierShowImageUrl, duierInfo_activity_status as duierStatus, duierInfo_need_undertaker as duierNeedUndertaker, duierInfo_update_time as duierUpdateTime, duierInfo_area as duierArea, (select count(distinct duierStatus_participant_id) from duierStatus where duierstatus_duier_Id = duierInfo_id) as duierParticipants, (select count(*) as comments from duierChatInfo where duierChatInfo_duierId = duierInfo_id) as duierComments, userInfo_name as duierOwnerName, userInfo_id as duierOwnerId, userInfo_headImage as duierUserHeaderImgUrl from duierInfo, userInfo where duierInfo_creator_id = userInfo_id limit #{nStartId},#{nItems}

select duierInfo_name as duierName, duierInfo_id as duierId, (select duierClass_name from duierClass where duierClass_id = #{nClassId}) as duierClass, duierInfo_activity_introduction as duierIntroduction, duierInfo_activity_img as duierShowImageUrl, duierInfo_activity_status as duierStatus, duierInfo_need_undertaker as duierNeedUndertaker, duierInfo_update_time as duierUpdateTime, duierInfo_area as duierArea, (select count(distinct duierStatus_participant_id) from duierStatus where duierstatus_duier_Id = duierInfo_id) as duierParticipants, (select count(*) as comments from duierChatInfo where duierChatInfo_duierId = duierInfo_id) as duierComments, userInfo_name as duierOwnerName, userInfo_id as duierOwnerId, userInfo_headImage as duierUserHeaderImgUrl from duierInfo, userInfo where duierInfo_class_id = #{nClassId} and duierInfo_creator_id = userInfo_id limit #{nStartId},#{nItems}
